import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { trackButtonClick, trackConsultationClick } from '../../utils/analytics'; const HeroSection: React.FC = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('hero.title')}

{t('hero.subtitle')}

{t('hero.subtitle2')}

trackButtonClick('Start Free Trial', 'Hero Section')} > {t('hero.startFreeTrial')} trackConsultationClick('Hero CTA')} > {t('hero.bookCall')}
{/* Payment Provider Logos - Black and White */}
Shopify
Google Pay
); }; export default HeroSection;
